attributes.action: English Nationals to have a referendum on the Union with Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details:
A referendum should be held around England ending the Union with Scotland.
Scottish Nationals will have a chance to vote to decide whether they wish to end the Union with England. However, it is undemocratic to allow Scots to vote on this matter and not for English Nationals to have the same opportunity. The referendum should also include whether to be independent from Wales and Northern Ireland.
The referendum should be held on the same day as Scotland votes in the referendum to end the Union with England.
